project.description: Perform coverage analysis on unit tests for Libra.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Delete the previous repo clone directories rm -rf li origin-dev-tools
# Clone the repos git clone git@github.com:openshift/li.git git clone git@github.com:openshift/origin-dev-tools.git
pushd li
# Build and install HEAD for the integration tests build/devenv launch libra_coverage_${BUILD_NUMBER} --verifier --instance_type m1.large build/devenv sync libra_coverage_${BUILD_NUMBER} --tag --clean_metadata
# Run the tests build/devenv test libra_coverage_${BUILD_NUMBER} --include_rcov --terminate
popd
